title: Huge Loft Live/Work Space in Olde Richmond
description:
This is a unique 1 bedroom / 1 bathroom industrial apartment on the lower level of a wonderful building in Olde Richmond. This is a great live / work space for artists since it’s large, open space offers so many opportunities! Features include exposed brick walls, in-unit laundry, central a/c, and a lovely shared outdoor space.
The unit welcomes you with clean concrete floors and large glass block windows for natural light. You’ll have a small room by the entry for a coat closet or storage space and a hallway leads to a sizable bedroom with hardwood floors, and then to your main living space. The common area expansive and showcases exposed spiral ductwork and storage lockers that divide the room. There’s no shortage of possibilities for furniture arrangements and the living space is open to the vast kitchen to ensure that entertaining is a breeze!
This fantastic kitchen boasts tile flooring, cabinetry below and built-in shelving above, a dishwasher, gas range, and 2 refrigerators. An island is in the middle with a butcher block countertop for prep space and additional storage options. Your in-unit washer and dryer are installed in the kitchen by an exposed brick wall for added convenience. Continue to your adorable bathroom with tile flooring, exposed brick, a vanity, medicine cabinet, and standing shower stall.
You’ll have access to a very big, shared outdoor patio with fire pit.
About The Neighborhood: Olde Richmond is a residential neighborhood, just north of Fishtown. Classic Philadelphia row homes and gorgeous trees line the streets. Cione Recreation Center offers local residents a large park, playground and swimming pool! Shopping is made easy with multiple mom & pop shops as well as shopping centers nearby. The location of the neighborhood allows residents to easily access I-95, Frankford Ave and the Betsey Ross Bridge. There is an abundance of public transportation in Olde Richmond, including the “El” subway line, the #15 Trolley Line and multiple SEPTA bus routes – connecting Olde Richmond to Center City and beyond. Neighborhood favorites include: Cook and Shaker, Memphis Taproom, Circles and Squares, Stocks Bakery, and so much more.
No Dogs. Cats OK
Listing is provided by JG Real Estate

title: Lounging Space For the Whole Party
description:
Welcome to this beautiful townhome in desirable Knolls of Birmingham! Looking for maintenance free living with scenic walking trails, a real pond, pool and tennis and pickleball courts? How about snow shoveled up to your front door and garage? Complete lawn and landscaping care? Located in award winning Unionville-Chadds Ford Schools including Blue Ribbon Chadds Ford Elementary, this maintenance free 3 bedroom, 3.5 bath home has been beautifully updated and improved throughout. The main level living space includes a spacious light filled living room with full size gas burning fireplace, gleaming hardwood floors throughout, many windows, an adjacent dining area all overlooking a scenic large rear yard area with woods and open space. The rear facing deck offers privacy and peace as you enjoy the park like setting and sunsets. The large eat in kitchen has plenty of newer beautiful wood cabinetry, granite counters, stainless appliances, tiled backsplash and large breakfast, lunch or dinner nook. Just down the main level hall is the custom pantry, updated half bath and a mud room area perfect for show storage just inside the large 2 car garage. The second level offers a cavernous primary suite offering his & hers walk-in closets with custom closet systems, an en suite full bath with large soaking tub, tiled shower stall, large double vanity and linen closet. The second bedroom with walk in closet and full hall bath complete the second level. The third level stairs offer a skylight on the way to the 3rd bedroom which offers a full en suite bath and plenty of closet space. The lower level finished basement offers great ceiling height, full size window, second half bath and could either be a large 2nd family room, game room, home office or sleeping area in addition to the laundry and large storage area. The exterior features newer James Hardie Plank siding, new soffit and fascia, oversize gutters, roof and fabulous exterior lighting and landscaping. Truly maintenance free living at it's finest! The Knolls of Birmingham is a wonderful walking community with a paved trail system, beautiful open space, a community pool and clubhouse, private tennis/pickle ball courts and the walking trail is connected to the incredible Sandy Hollow Battlefield park and trail system adding miles of extra scenic and historic open space. It's like being on vacation all year long. This home is very efficient with very low utility costs. Knolls Of Birmingham is located in the Historic Brandywine Valley just a short drive to world class attractions such as Longwood Gardens, Winterthur, many private golf courses, swim clubs, Brandywine River Museum, and many other historical attractions. Easy access to the routes 202, 1, 322, 95 and upscale restaurants, shopping, Award winning Unionville Chadds Ford schools.

title: Welcome to The Vine located in the heart of the Francisville
description:
Welcome to The Vine located at 1723 Francis Street in the heart of the Francisville section of the highly sought-after Fairmount neighborhood. Enter into the wide-open floor plan that features large windows throughout, filling every inch with an abundance of natural light. The beautiful kitchen is equipped with walnut and white two-tone Porcelanosa cabinets and white quartz countertops, black finishes, and stainless-steel appliances. Your generously sized bedroom offers a large closet with custom built ins, and the bathroom features designer tile and custom vanities. The full-size washer and dryer is tucked away in the laundry closet in the unit for your convenience. This unit is finished with modern conveniences such as the NEST thermostat and LATCH keyless entry system! Take advantage of the shared roof deck with stunning views of Center City, an additional dog run space for pet lovers, and secured mail and package room for all of your deliveries. Don’t miss your chance to fall in love with The Vine, contact to tour today!
1723 Francis St #1B

The kitchen features stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and plenty of cabinet space, while the living area is perfect for entertaining guests or simply relaxing after a long day. Both bedrooms are generously sized and located on separate levels for added privacy, with ample closet space for all your storage needs. In addition, this unit comes with off-street parking and in-unit laundry, making daily life more convenient and enjoyable. The rooftop deck is one of the highlights of this apartment, providing stunning views of the city skyline. Whether you want to soak up the sun, enjoy a meal al fresco, or simply relax with friends and family, the rooftop provides the perfect setting. The in-unit washer and dryer also add to the convenience and comfort of living at 90 E Laurel St #B. The Northern Liberties neighborhood is known for its vibrant atmosphere, with some of the best restaurants, shops, and entertainment that the city has to offer. title: New fully rehabbed apartments offer modern living in a historic distri
description:
Welcome to 1924 Spruce St! Nestled in the desirable Rittenhouse Square neighborhood, these new fully rehabbed apartments offer modern living in a historic district. The building has been home to prominent Philadelphia families such as Dr. John Hooker Packard, one of the most prominent American surgeons of the late 19th century; and the Philadelphia lawyer, Earl B. Putnam. Later covered to apartments in 1945, the most recent renovation was finalized in October 2022. The building holds eight (8) stunning brand-new units offering high-end appliances, including trash compactors, elevator access and lovely views of Center City. There are a variety of floor plans available for those seeking 1 to 3 bedrooms and you won't have to worry about laundry, as each apartment has a wash/ dryer in the unit. With so many attractions nearby, this location is the epitome of ideal: steps away from Rittenhouse Park, Starbucks, restaurants, shopping, and so much more. title: Beautiful tucked away community located in the heart of Bella Vista
description:
Welcome to Carriage Mews, a beautiful tucked away community located in the heart of Bella Vista and the Meredith School Catchment, offering 1-car garage parking and a quiet shared courtyard. This 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom, extra wide townhome has been nicely updated and maintained throughout the years. Enter directly through the garage to the first floor featuring an open kitchen and dining area, a large pantry, a conveniently located half bath and a coat closet. The updated kitchen with newer stainless-steel appliances, quartz countertops, a nicely tiled backsplash, gas cooking, and an island for additional storage and counterspace. The spacious dining room (could also double as additional living space) features a wood burning fireplace and glass siding doors overlooking the beautiful well-manicured courtyard. Up the stairs is an oversized living room with hardwood floors, built-in cabinets, a ceiling fan and a large storage closet. This floor also features two nicely sized bedrooms both with closets and great natural light, a laundry closet, and a full bathroom with a tub. Continue up to the beautiful primary bedroom with south facing sliding glass doors to the Juliette Balcony, a wall of closets and access to your private bathroom with a tub and stall shower. Off the bedroom is a bonus living space and additional closets, great for a home office, playroom or an additional lounging area. Lastly, exit out to the private deck with tree top views, perfect for relaxing with a good book. Many recent updates: new Anderson doors & noise cancelling windows (2019), HVAC (2021), washer & dryer (2017), kitchen appliances (2019), and more! Plenty of storage throughout the home as well as in the garage. Located on a quiet street just off Cianfrani Park. Quick walk to Whole Foods, ACME, the Italian Market and some of the city’s best restaurants. Immediate move-in available.
705-11 Pemberton St #711

Head upstairs to the 3rd floor where you will find the master suite with an amazing walk- in closet 4 piece bathroom, soaking tub, stall shower, double vanity, dual flush toilet and two windows to take in the bright natural light of the sun. At the rear of the hallway sits bedroom #3. Head up to the 4th floor and you will find two more bedrooms and a hall bath, laundry room , storage space and deck that over looks the center city skyline. The basement is fully finished with full bathroom , very high ceilings, great for entertaining, gym or private living quarters. The two car garage has two entrances one leading directly into foyer and one that leads to basement. Truly a must see!

title: This one-of-a-kind bi-level condominium was custom designed by Philade
description: This one-of-a-kind bi-level condominium was custom designed by Philadelphia's Tattooedmom herself, Kathy Hughes. Located in the Commodore Barry Building in the heart of Society Hill this unit has its own private entrance on tree-lined Pine Street. The spacious entry vestibule is large enough to accommodate a bike and includes a convenient coat closet. The living room features soaring ceilings, gracefully proportioned windows, original wood doors, a gorgeous marble fireplace, and columns flanking the space. The 1st-floor bedroom suite is spacious and light-filled with a second marble fireplace, a walk-in closet, and a luxurious en suite bathroom. Enter the lower level through sweeping brick archways into a kitchen with custom cabinetry, tasteful granite countertops, stainless steel appliances. The bonus space next to the kitchen has Osborne & Little flocked wallpaper and is a great space for a dining room, living room, or home office. This level is rounded out by a powder room and a laundry room with great storage space. If that isn't enough storage space there is a separate storage locker in the building's basement. You can't help but be captivated by the unique character of this special home, the elegance of this historic property has been maintained while smart updates throughout have added a modern touch.

title: Move right in to this fully updated two-bedroom/two-bath!
description:
Move right in to this fully updated two-bedroom/two-bath Graduate Hospital residence. Sun streams into the dramatic two-story living room, where a wood-burning fireplace is waiting to warm your winter days. Built-in bookshelves and excellent wall space for art complete the picture. Off of the living room is a storage room with laundry facilities and mechanicals for the unit. The eat-in kitchen is finished with neutral wood cabinetry topped in granite along with a stainless refrigerator, stainless undermount sink and a gas range. The kitchen also features a tile floor and backsplash, and the dining area includes bench seating with built-in storage. Access a rear deck from this level that provides a spot for a café table or chaise. There is a bedroom on this level served by a full bath with stall shower and pedestal sink. An upstairs bedroom also has a full bath with a tub/shower. Both bedroom closets include organizers. This is a great opportunity to join one of the city’s most vibrant neighborhoods close to Center City and points west into University City. **Disclaimer BOTH bedrooms do not have carpet anymore. Newly installed vinyl floors in both bedrooms.**
2029 Bainbridge St #1

title: Seasonal Bike Share Program, Professional on-site management team
description: Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient.
